title: “Solar Glitter” Makes Its Mark On The Space Solar Race
description:
Microscopic particles of "solar glitter" form the foundation of new photovoltaic technology launched by the US startup mPower for space solar applications.

The post “Solar Glitter” Makes Its Mark On The Space Solar Race appeared first on CleanTechnica.
